statements: SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, last_name, first_name FROM patients WHERE social_security_number = '123-45-6789';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE last_name LIKE 'Sm%';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1980-01-01' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE social_security_number LIKE '123%';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE social_security_number = '4567890';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_dob > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT Patients.patient_name, Patients.patient_address FROM Patients LEFT JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.record_id IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM MedicalRecords GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, doctor_name FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM MedicalRecords;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, doctor_name FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM patients WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, doctor_id, status FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT doctor_id, first_name, last_name, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM medical_records WHERE entry_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date, status FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT first_name, last_name, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY specialty DESC;

SELECT patients.first_name, appointments.appointment_date, doctors.specialty FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patient ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT address, contact_number FROM Patient WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT full_name, address, contact_number FROM Patient WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT full_name, contact_number, address FROM Patient WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patient WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT full_name, address, contact_number FROM Patient WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31'
SELECT * FROM Medical_Record WHERE diagnosis = 'Diabetes' AND appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, doctor_name FROM Appointment WHERE reason_for_visit IS NOT NULL
